Title: Olga 4 Tier Cabinet in Brown Colour

Details.Dimensions:: H 41 x W 29 x D 17 (All Dimension in Inches)

Description: Established in 2011, Zorin has established itself as a major furniture powerhouse in a relatively small period. Manufactured from high-grade engineered wood, Zorins products have become outstanding hallmarks of quality, elegance, durability & affordability. Modern is a distinct, defined style which originated in the early 1900s. It uses a combination of vinyl, steel, plastic, glass or wood having monochromatic colors and sleek silhouettes. Modern furniture lives at the intersection of clean lines and relaxed comfort accentuating form and function. A chest of drawers, also called a bureau, is a type of cabinet that has multiple parallel, horizontal drawers usually stacked one above another. Chests of drawers have traditionally been used for storing clothing, especially underwear, socks, and other items not normally hung in or otherwise stored in a closet. They are usually placed in a bedroom for this purpose but can actually be used to store anything that will fit inside.
